result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

10:31 AM Defendant STEPHANIE J MOORE in court, in custody.  Attorney William Scott Nelson in court for STEPHANIE J MOORE.  Attorney Gerise Marie Laspisa in court for State of Wisconsin. Statement by the Court - understands from the clerk that $4,000.00 has been posted and the other $1,000.00 will be posted soon. Atty Nelson requests to withdraw the motion to modify bond.

Court adjourned at 10:32 AM
from Clerk of Courts to Karan Stelter (sign enclosed Bail Bond Deposit Acknowledgement form and return)

Motion hearing on September 14, 2022 at 10:30 am.
Defendant's
Return date on November 21, 2022 at 10:30 am.

11:32 AM Defendant STEPHANIE J MOORE in court, in custody.  Attorney William Scott Nelson in court for STEPHANIE J MOORE.  Attorney Gerise Marie Laspisa in court for State of Wisconsin. Attorney Nelson acknowledges receipt of the information and waives any reading. Atty Nelson enters a plea of Not Guilty on behalf of the defendant. Court confirms it mirrors the criminal complaint. Atty Nelson requests bond modification and states reasons. DA Laspisa objects. Statement by the Court. Court states there needs to be a concrete plan for treatment to be allowed and a motion needs to be filed. Court will set for Return Date November 21, 2022 at 10:30 AM.

Court adjourned at 11:37 AM

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt: Arraignment on September 7, 2022 at 11:30 am.

10:23 AM Defendant STEPHANIE J MOORE in court, in custody.  Attorney Gerise Marie Laspisa in court for State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Michael Kapelis in court for STEPHANIE J MOORE. Atty Kapelis states def will waive the preliminary hearing. Def concurs. Court instructs the defendant regarding his/her right to a preliminary examination. Defendant waives his/her right to a preliminary examination. Court finds probable cause. Court accepts the waiver of the prelim and binds the defendant over for trial. 

State files an information with the court and sends a copy to Atty Kapelis and Atty Nelson. Atty Kapelis requests a separate date for the arraignment. Court sets arraignment for September 7, 2022 at 11:30 AM.

Court adjourned at 10:25 AM.
Letter to the Court from Atty Nelson dated Aug 12, 2022 re: Waiver of Prelim

11:04 AM Defendant STEPHANIE J MOORE in court, in custody.  Attorney Gerise Marie Laspisa in court for State of Wisconsin.  Attorney William Scott Nelson in court for STEPHANIE J MOORE. Atty Nelson makes statement re: bond modification request. Statement by DA - objects to modification. Court makes statement. Court denies the motion to modify bond.

Court adjourned at 11:10 AM

Atty William Nelson
Second appearance on August 16, 2022 at 10:00 am.

1:04 PM Defendant STEPHANIE J MOORE in court, in custody.  Attorney Matt McElroy in court for State of Wisconsin. Court goes over the time limits of the preliminary hearing and a prelim is scheduled tomorrow. Statement by the defendant. Statement by the Court. Further statement by the defendant - will waive the time limits. Court cancels the prelim scheduled on 07/26 and sets for Status of Counsel on August 16, 2022 at 10:00 AM.

Court adjourned at 1:07 PM
records.descr: Waiver of time limits for preliminary hearing

records.addlTxt: Preliminary hearing on July 26, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Status hearing on July 25, 2022 at 01:00 pm.

ADDRESS INFO for STEPHANIE J MOORE
Current: 571 County Road A, c/o Green Lake County Jail, Green Lake, WI 54941 United States  (Effective: 07-19-2022)
Prior: 610 Densmoor St, Markesan, WI 53946

9:34 AM Defendant STEPHANIE J MOORE appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Gerise Marie Laspisa in court for State of Wisconsin. Defendant has no objection to holding this hearing via zoom. Defendant confirms receipt of the criminal complaint and waives reading. Court instructs the defendant of the maximum penalty on each count. Court instructs defendant of his/her right to an attorney.  Court notes bond has been set - $5,000 cash and absolute sobriety. Statement by defendant - requests a bond reduction. Statement by the Court regarding bond. Court goes over right to counsel and how to obtain one. Court instructs defendant regarding his/her right to a preliminary hearing. Defendant does not waive the time limits. Defendant is to complete processing with the Green Lake County Sheriff's Department. Court will set for Preliminary Hearing on July 26, 2022 at 8:30 AM.

Court adjourned at 9:38 AM

NOTE: per judge, set for status hearing on July 25, 2022 at 1:00 PM
**PROCESSING COMPLETE**
**PROCESSING NEEDED**
Defendant is to maintain absolute sobriety - not to possess or consume any alcohol, illegal drugs or prescription drugs without a valid prescription.  You may be randomly tested for compliance.
Defendant is to maintain absolute sobriety - not to possess or consume any alcohol, illegal drugs or prescription drugs without a valid prescription.  You may be randomly tested for compliance.

1:07 p.m. Defendant appears via zoom video, in custody, and without counsel. Gerise Laspisa appears in person for the State of Wisconsin. DA makes bond request. Court orders $5,000 cash bond and Defendant is to maintain absolute sobriety - not to possess or consume any alcohol, illegal drugs or prescription drugs without a valid prescription.  You may be randomly tested for compliance. Court sets for initial appearance on July 19, 2022 at 9:30 a.m. Court adjourned at 1:10 p.m.
